subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Bob Kustra, Boise State’s president, said that a claim by Ohio State that Big Ten and Southeastern Conference teams play a “murderer’s row” schedule was an exaggeration.
snippet: Bob Kustra, Boise State’s president, said that a claim by Ohio State that Big Ten and Southeastern Conference teams play a “murderer’s row” schedule was an exaggeration.
